mods:name.mods:namePart: Community Service Society of New York
Community Service Society of New York

mods:mods.mods:abstract: Annotation on back: Stamped on front (across Mr. Henry and Mr. Gifford) Conway Studios New York, N.Y. The 1969-70 Telephone directory has a Conway Studios 3 West 30 St. Phone: 736-9100 Seated, L to R: Barklie Henry, Walter Gifford, Bayard Pope Standing, L to R: Samuel Welldon, Franklin Kirkbride, Charles E. Merrill, William J. O'Connor, <text> recognize. Identified by Miss Tousley, 10/1/71.

Description: #7060 Stamped Conway Studios This picture was taken sometime after AICP and COS merged on April 12, 1939, to form the CSS. Seated, left to right: Barklie McKee Henry, President of CSS and former President of AICP; Walter S. Gifford, Chairman of Board of CSS and former President of COS; Bayard F. Pope, Vice-Chairman of Board of CSS and former Vice-President of COS. Standing, left to right: Samuel A. Welldon, CSS Board of Trustees and former COS Central Council; Franklin B. Kirkbride, CSS Board of Trustees and former AICP Board of Managers; Charles E. Merrill, Jr., CSS Board of Trustees and former COS Central Council; William J. O'Connor, CSS Board of Trustees*; last man not identified.** For additional Information regarding any of the above, see "Corporate Files, Trustees (Past)" in the Archives. * Mr. O'Connor was appointed to the CSS Board In I942. This picture, therefore, could not have been taken before 1942. **The gentlemen In this picture were identified Oct. 1, 1971, by Miss Clare M. Tousley, former Director of the Department of Public Interest, who retired In I954.

mods:location.mods:physicalLocation: Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Columbia University
